Help

How service works:

1. You register by mail and fill in your personal data, choose your interest for which you want to find a partner and a few facts about yourself.

Registration form

2. Log in and enter your personal account. Press the "Ready to meet" button and you will be shown 5 potential partners suitable for your interests. Contact them by mail and communicate.

Personal Account example

3. If at the moment you are not ready for meetings, just click the "Ready for a meeting" button again and from that moment your card will not be shown to other participants. If you want new partners, just refresh the page.

"Ready" button example

What personal account can:

Edit personal data

If you want to change your interest in matching a partner or other personal information, click the "Edit profile" button and in the window that appears, enter new data and click "Save". You can also change your avatar. Click on an existing avatar and upload a new one in the window that appears.

Change password

You can change the password for your account. Just use the form on this page below.

Logout or delete account

If you want to log out of your account or delete it completely, click the "Logout" button at the top of the personal account page or "Delete profile" at the bottom.
